      "severity": "MEDIUM",

      "recommendation": "Use more generic error messages that do not disclose whether the email or password was incorrect."

      "title": "JWT Token Exposure",
      "severity": "HIGH",

      "recommendation": "Ensure that the JWT is transmitted over HTTPS and consider using additional security measures such as token expiration and refresh tokens."
    },
    {
      "title": "Lack of HTTPS Enforcement",
      "severity": "CRITICAL",
      "cwe_id": "CWE-319",
      "description": "The application does not enforce HTTPS, which could lead to man-in-the-middle attacks and exposure of sensitive information.",

      "recommendation": "Implement HTTPS enforcement to ensure that all data transmitted between the client and server is encrypted."
